value.stringValue: Failed to get update from Middleware!
Failed to get update from Opus!
An update was made in Opus!
There was an error during the request.
Canvas Enrollment exists but it should be dropped!

assignments.name: Set_Get_Canvas_User_Failure_Message
assignments.label: Set Get Canvas User Failure Message

value.stringValue: Salesforce could not find the enrollment... please ask IT for help.
Canvas Enrollment was not found, but should exist - it has been requested! Please wait a moment and click 'Check Enrollment' again.
Failed to send query - this is most likely due to permissions.
Could not get Canvas login id from Opus!
This flow will walk you through checking all parts of the invoice. If it is already cancelled or complete - there is nothing to do!

decisions.name: Is_the_expected_Canvas_Enrollment_here
decisions.label: Is the expected Canvas Enrollment here?

formulas.name: CanvasLoginDisplay
formulas.expression: IF(({!ContactToReview.Primary_Canvas_Username__c} == ''), 'This Contact does not have a Canvas Login!', 'Canvas Login: '&{!ContactToReview.Primary_Canvas_Username__c})

formulas.name: MissingEnrollmentFoundMessage
formulas.expression: 'Canvas Enrollment for line item was missing, but has been found and updated.'

variables.description: Message based on the chosen path.
variables.name: PathMessage
